name: The Chef
description:
WASD to move

Space to swing your knife and parry projectiles

Play as a chef running, jumping swinging and parrying through 4 diffrent areas to collect the ingredients to make buttered chicken all the while plagued by side effects! This game was made for Jame Gam #25 and is also my second game jam game! Music and sound effects were provided by Pixabay, Mixkit and various itch pages. Other than that all assets were drawn by me :).
